ygData.subject: Re: Gear choices, need some advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Kinda what I was thinking.  I like the crown. It doesn t show up as a goofy helmet. The crown of leaves comes from Narra Tanith, a rare spawn in South Karana.
ygData.messageBody:
Kinda what I was thinking. I like the crown. It doesn't show up as a
goofy helmet.

The crown of leaves comes from Narra Tanith, a rare spawn in South
Karana. I traded a polished granite tomahawk I just happened to get
for it.


From: "Chrisstauf k" <chrisstauf@...>
Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Gear choices, need some advice
Date: Tue, 25 Jan 2000 15:39:08 MST

+25 mana = +5 wis now...but you have to remember that every level your mana
gain will increase with the addition to +5 to your wis...I would stick with
the Crown of leaves..unless you want to give it to a fellow cleric :)

Could you list some info on where/how to get the Crown of Leaves?

thanks

Chrisstauf Healingsould
Priest of Light for the Lightbringers
25th Cleric of Karana


>From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Gear choices, need some advice
>Date: Tue, 25 Jan 2000 22:29:55 GMT
>
>I've been blessed with too much gear, and I want some opinions.
>
>I'm a 25th level high elf cleric. My current wisdom with my
>current gear is 173. I have some extra gear that I'm trying to choose
>between:
>
>head :
>runed circlet AC:4, +4 int, +4 wis
>crown of leaves AC:1 +5 wisdom
>Zaharn's Coronet AC:5 +3 str, +25 mana
>
>I'm thinking the Zaharn's Coronet is the best, since 25 mana is equal
>to +5 wisdom, but I am a bit egotistical when it comes to wisdom, so
>I'll be sad if my wisdom went down, even though I know the result is
>the same.
>
>Arms :
>steel AC:8
>barbed armplates: AC7, dex +2
>(I'd like a pair of Hollowed bone bracers, but I don't have 'em)
>
>Too low level to go fight Gull alone, but I want the cleric arms.
>
>
>Another question,
>Do you think gatorscale leggings are better than the cleric legs?
>It's a AC 4 reduction, but an increase in +4 wisdom. Just curious on
>everyone's thoughts on this one. Does gatorscale look like leather?
>
>
